entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
